author: Linda Givetash and Colin Sheeley and Lidia Sirna and Hernan Muñoz Ratto and Michelle Velez and Brooke Gehris
title: U.S. coronavirus death toll highest in the world
description: "We are hoping to see a rather sharp decrease and decline in the cases in New York," said Dr. Anthony Fauci, the nation's top infectious disease expert.
content:
The United States now has the lead with the most deaths from the coronavirus outbreak of any nation worldwide with nearly 22,000 lives lost.
Meanwhile in Italy, previously the worst-hit country, officials on Monday were considering loosening lockdown measure… [+4157 chars]
